title: How to fix my HP printer which is offline on Windows 10 - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey, I'm just giving you some general steps that may assist you. Go to control panel, then select hardware and then go to printers and check if the power cord is correctly inserted within the printercheck if the USB attached to your device is correctly working or notcross-check if the USB port on which the USB is plugged within the device is functioning and check out plugging it into another USB portcheck if the printer is installed correctly, if not reinstall the printer with the right installation process.Hope this helps!!
